:v-model.description: The v-model binds a boolean variable to control the opening and closing of the pop-up layer
:v-model.description_zh: 通过v-model绑定一个布尔值的变量控制弹出层的打开和收起

mask.description: Whether or not to display a mask

zoom.description: Whether to enable zoom animation is valid only when the mode is set to center
zoom.description_zh: 是否开启缩放动画，只在mode为center时有效

safe-area-inset-bottom.description: Whether to enable the bottom safe zone adaptation
safe-area-inset-bottom.description_zh: 是否开启底部安全区适配

mask-close-able.description: Click on the mask to see if you can turn off the pop-up layer
mask-close-able.description_zh: 点击遮罩是否可以关闭弹出层

z-index.description: The z-index value of the pop-up content

closeable.description: Whether or not to display the close icon

close-icon.description: Turn off the name of the icon and only the built-in icon of uView
close-icon.description_zh: 关闭图标的名称，只能uView的内置图标

close-icon-pos.description: Customize the position of the close icon, top-left is the upper left corner, top-right is the upper right corner, bottom-left is the lower left corner, and bottom-right is the lower right corner
close-icon-pos.description_zh: 自定义关闭图标位置，top-left为左上角，top-right为右上角，bottom-left为左下角，bottom-right为右下角

close-icon-color.description: Turn off the color of the icon

close-icon-size.description: Turn off the size of the icon, in rpx

width.description: mode = left | center | right时有效，优先级高于length
width.description_zh: mode = left | center | right时有效，优先级高于length

height.description: mode = top | center | bottom时有效，优先级高于length
height.description_zh: mode = top | center | bottom时有效，优先级高于length

negative-top.description: When the middle pops up, in order to avoid the keyboard that may pop up, the value offset upwards is arbitrary, and the value is rpx by default
negative-top.description_zh: 中部弹出时，以避免可能弹出的键盘重合，往上偏移的值，单位任意，数值则默认为rpx单位

mask-custom-style.description: Mask custom style, generally used to modify the mask transparency object form, for example: {background: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'}
mask-custom-style.description_zh: 遮罩自定义样式，一般用于修改遮罩透明度对象形式，如：{background: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'}

duration.description: The time of the animation transition when the mask is open or collapsed, in ms
duration.description_zh: 遮罩打开或收起的动画过渡时间，单位ms
